MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_45: Helps you monitor what happens in a folder.
English.Char_Desc_80: FolderMonitor helps you monitor what happens in a folder.
English.Char_Desc_250: FolderMonitor helps you monitor what happens in a folder. When something changes you can get popupâ€™s and sound alerts. You can also execute commands based on the changes.
